content: Wixvps.com high-performance VPS hosting solutions. Choose from a wide range of plans, including our popular Linux VPS and Windows RDP Servers. comments.author: EustormBit
comments.created_time: July 30, 2023, 03:24:26 PMLast edit: July 30, 2023, 03:37:19 PM by EustormBit
comments.body: WixVPS just labelled me a hacker, because they saw email extractor software and power grep for searching through large files. I wonder how they think every business in the world gets their b2b Leads.I am an honest upwork freelancer but wixvps is hoping i'm a hacker so they can justify shutting down my RDP server without a refund.Now they are giving me 20 minutes to download my files, with zero refund. whoever is doing your risk assessment needs to lay off the weed and visit upwork.com's lead generation section  https://www.upwork.com/nx/jobs/search/?q=lead%20generationSTOP PROFILING YOUR CLIENTS Maybe if you had hired me instead of profiling me you wouldn't have just 50 customers.

comments.author: wixvps
comments.body: We don't allow running email extractor software of any kinds. Sorry its just not allowed.It's against our TOS.We gave you whole 15 days to download your files.Thank you.Sorry we don't do advertisement by spamming people personal inboxes without there permission. thanks for your lead generation offer.

comments.author: stormbounty
comments.body: Paid for a VPS , it’s been 3 days and I got nothing. AVOID

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: stormbounty on June 05, 2024, 03:18:25 PMPaid for a VPS , it’s been 3 days and I got nothing. AVOIDMight be a good thing if you just create a scam accusation in this board and follow this reporting formatOnce the evidence that you were scammed is presented there. DT members can flag and tag the account to warn other users about it. OP has been offline since November last year, so I have some doubts if he will be back soon, but thanks for the warning in this thread.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on June 05, 2024, 05:14:01 PMQuote from: stormbounty on June 05, 2024, 03:18:25 PMPaid for a VPS , it’s been 3 days and I got nothing. AVOIDMight be a good thing if you just create a scam accusation in this board and follow this reporting formatOnce the evidence that you were scammed is presented there. DT members can flag and tag the account to warn other users about it. OP has been offline since November last year, so I have some doubts if he will be back soon, but thanks for the warning in this thread.OP has not been present here for more than 6 months. I don't believe that a flag or a tag will change anything, but it would certainly be useful to open a scam accusation so that others will be warned.
